title: Fig and lemon chicken
ingredients: ['1 lemon, juiced', '3 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '4 tablespoons white wine vinegar', '4 tablespoons water', '675g (1 1/2 lb) dried figs', '1 lemon, sliced', '12 chicken thighs', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'handful chopped fresh parsley']
